sections.heading: Duration of recordation of judicial mortgageThe effect of recordation of a judgment creating a judicial mortgage ceases ten years after the date of the judgment
sections.text: Acts 2005, No. 169, ยง1, eff. Jan. 1, 2006; Acts 2005, 1st Ex. Sess., No. 13, ยง1, eff. Nov. 29, 2005.NOTE: Acts 2005, 1st Ex. Sess., No. 13,
